article_title: FM condemns attack on Israel and repeats ceasefire call
sentence: Mr  Yousaf  has  repeatedly  called  for  a  ceasefire  in  the  region  and  has  criticised  Israel's  response  to  Hamas's  attacks  on  7  October,  in  which  about  1,200  people  were  killed  and  253  others  were  taken  hostage.

article_title: FM condemns attack on Israel and repeats ceasefire call
sentence: More  than  30,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed  in  that  campaign,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: FM condemns attack on Israel and repeats ceasefire call
sentence: Speaking  on  Sunday  morning,  Mr  Yousaf  said  the  "vast  majority"  of  those  killed  in  the  conflict  in  Gaza  were  innocent  women  and  children.
